acorn.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the nut of the oak tree
acorn.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: A Classification of Residential Neighbourhoods; a system in Britain of putting areas of the country into different classes according to the incomes of the people who live there
acorn.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: the five local authorities with the worst housing conditions under the ACORN scheme
